author: Allan Smith
title: Hundreds gather in North Carolina and Missouri to protest stay-at-home orders
description: The protests were the latest in a string of gatherings across the country. President Donald Trump has offered encouragement to the demonstrators.
content:
Hundreds of protesters gathered at state capitols in North Carolina and Missouri to protest stay-at-home orders Tuesday, the latest in a wave of demonstrations against statewide restrictions aimed at curbing the spread of coronavirus.
The small protests feat… [+2034 chars]
